content: to 1st st chain 1 16 7 single_crochet 1 increase x 2 slip_stitch to front loop of 1st st insert st markers in back loop of first and last st not connecting slip_stitch of this row these will mark the r9 beginning/end of the stitches you will work in the r9 back loops in r11 18 r10 flo slip_stitch around switch to underbody color slip_stitch to blo of 1st st of r9 chain 1 18 + 1 in blo of r9 18 single_crochet slip_stitch to 1st st chain 1 r11 remove stitch markers inserted in r9 18 r12 2 single_crochet 1 decrease 2 single_crochet x3 15 slip_stitch around leave long tail for sewing cut yarn r13 stuff firmly 15 6 7 mask x1 size g / 4 25 mm hook mask color # of row stitches r1 chain 5 starting in 2nd chain from hook 4 single_crochet chain 1 and turn 4 r2 4 increase chain 1 and turn 8 r3 single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 8 r4 1 increase 2 single_crochet 2 increase 2 single_crochet 1 increase chain 1 and turn 12 r5 single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 12 r6 1 increase 4 single_crochet 2 increase 4 single_crochet 1 increase chain 1 and turn 16 r7 single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 16 r8 1 increase 6 single_crochet 2 increase 6 single_crochet 1 increase chain 1 and turn 20 r9 single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 20 r10 1 increase 8 single_crochet 2 increase 8 single_crochet 1 increase chain 1 and turn 24 r11 single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 24 r12 1 increase 10 single_crochet 2 increase 10 single_crochet 1 increase chain 1 and turn 28 r13 single_crochet across chain 1 and turn 28 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch 3 slip_stitch x 2 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch 40 in rough side of r1-r13 13 slip_stitch then in other side of starting chain from r1 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet r15 then in other rough side of r1-r13 13 slip_stitch 29 in r14 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet chain 2 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet chain 2 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 slip_stitch leave very r16 long tail for sewing cut yarn invisible finish 52 8 9 plate a x1 size g / 4 25 mm hook plate color # of row stitches r1 chain 25 starting in 2nd chain from hook 11 single_crochet 2 increase 11 single_crochet chain 1 and turn 26 r2 1 triple single_crochet increase 11 single_crochet 2
